## CreateVideoElementFromStream() function

Creates a `<video>` element for the given stream.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function CreateVideoElementFromStream(stream: MediaStream): HTMLVideoElement;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  stream | MediaStream | The stream to associate with the video element. |

<b>Returns:</b>

HTMLVideoElement
